sourcesContent:
import Title from '../../../components/Title/Title' // import ColumnItem from './ColumnItem' const Column = (column, parentClassName) => { const {title, links} = column const currentClassName = parentClassName ? `${parentClassName}__column` : 'column' const childClassName = parentClassName ? parentClassName : currentClassName return `
${title ? Title(title, childClassName) : ''}
    ${links?.length ? links.map((link) => ColumnItem(link, childClassName)).join('') : '' }
` } export default Column
